thread.title: Now, Najib says Kit Siang is de facto opposition leader
thread.title_full: Now, Najib says Kit Siang is de facto opposition leader

title: Now, Najib says Kit Siang is de facto opposition leader
text:
Amid a debate on whether Dr Mahathir Mohamad was the de facto opposition leader, Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak has decided to chip in, stating that it is DAP supremo Lim Kit Siang who holds the position. 
“Lim Kit Siang is Pakatan’s de facto leader. DAP should stop trying to hide it. 
“Voters know DAP has the most opposition seats and Lim Kit Siang calls the shots,” he said in a Twitter posting today.
